description: The Coronaviridae family of viruses are enveloped, single-stranded positive-sense RNA viruses grouped into four genera (alpha, betac, gamma and deltacoronavirus) that primarily infect birds and mammals, including humans and bats. The seven coronaviruses known to infect humans fall within the alpha- and betacoronavirus genera, whereas gamma- and deltacoronaviruses primarily infect birds.
name: Coronavirus (HCoV) Antibodies and Antigens
